personalInfo.clubAffl: Bear Lakes Golf & CC (West Palm Beach, FL)

tourBios.curYrHigh: Joined PGA TOUR Latinoamérica by finishing fifth at the Mazatlan, Mexico Q-School in January.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: At age 17, reached the quarterfinals of the 2014 U.S. Junior Amateur Championship, where he lost to second-seeded Sam Horsfield, of England, 1 up... He won five tournaments during the 2013-14 Future Collegians World Tour season, along with the St. Augustine (Fla.) Amateur and the Florida Azalea Amateur... Was a member of the Norwegian team that won the 2014 TOYOTA Junior Golf World Cup in Japan... Also won the Norwegian Junior Championship.
tourBios.personal: Earliest golf memory is the first birdie he made at the age of 10... First-tee introduction song would be "Best Day of my Life" by American Authors… Twitter name is @andreashalvorse... Instagram name is @andreashalvors1... Snapshat is andreaas96
tourBios.exmtStatus: Exempt - Finished 2-11 at 2016 Q-School (exempt to midseason reshuffle)
